markdownRemark.html:
I enjoy making websites and flying airplanes.

Before graduating from UND’s John D. Odegard School of Aerospace Science in 2007, I had two years in Seattle University’s excellent Honors Program. Ask me about philosophy, history, or aviation, and I will probably hold forth at length; sorry in advance.

The majority of the time I work at Redfin as a front end developer on our design systems team.
